options.text: AI model accuracy may drop with unique team slang or jargon.
options.why: Could reduce task update accuracy, impacting trust.
assumptions: AI can't pre-train on all slang

options.text: AI misinterpretation of creative tasks could reduce efficiency by 15%
options.why: Inaccurate task handling may lead to rework and frustration

options.text: User resistance to replacing Trello with Slack bot could limit adoption to 60%
options.why: Teams may prefer familiar tools, slowing transition.
assumptions: Slack bot is perceived as less useful
